Roman Chugunov

Mobile Apps Developer

Kotlin • Android • Software Development • Domain-Driven Design (DDD)

With a decade of expertise in mobile app development, I have played a pivotal role in the creation and evolution of renowned financial applications, including Chase UK, Nutmeg Saving and Investments, Revolut, and the Malwarebytes mobile app, which offers sophisticated security solutions for Android devices.

Download CV PDF

Nutmeg Investment App

UK largest digital wealth manager

As a Lead Android Developer I worked on many features in the app, mentored other team members and brought Nutmeg investments experience to Chase UK mobile app.

Go to Nutmeg

Revolut App

Global neobank and FinTech company

I worked in a position of Senior Android developer in a team of ~100 developers. I worked closely with product owners designers and backend to deliver such features as Rewards, Joint accounts, Revolut's proprietary feature toggle framework and many others.

Go to Revolut

My Articles

Code reviews

Gradle modules

Unit testing

During my career I explored a variety of technical domains and subjects in software engineering. While working on the ongoing projects I dive deep into the technology, learn something new and then share it with the community trying to word it in simple language. I have writings about such domains as Android Native development, structuring projects with large codebase, different aspects of mobile apps testing and doing code reviews of high quality.
